---
html:
  embed_local_images: true # 將所有的本地圖片嵌入為 base64 格式
  embed_svg: true
  offline: false
  toc: true

title: <input title here>
puppeteer:
  printBackground: true
  landscape: false
  format: "A4"
  # timeout: 3000 # <= 特殊設置，意味著等待（waitFor） 3000 毫秒
  headerTemplate: '<div style="position: relative; width:100%; text-align:center; border-bottom: 1pt solid #eeeeee; margin: 30px 0px 10px; font-size: 8pt"></span><div style="position: absolute; text-align: left;bottom: -5px;left: 30px;"><img height=30px src="data:image/png;charset=utf-8;base64," alt></p></div><div style="position: absolute; width:100%; text-align: center; bottom: 5px;"><span class=title></div><div style="position: absolute; text-align: right; bottom: 5px;right: 20px;">version: 1.0</div></div>'
  footerTemplate: '<div style="position: relative; width: 100%; text-align: left; border-top: 1pt solid #eeeeee; margin: 10px 0px 30px; font-size: 8pt;"><div style="position: absolute; width: 100%; text-align: left; top: 5px; left: 20px">&copy; Guangzhou Tyrafos Semiconductor Technologies Co., Ltd – Confidential & Proprietary</div><div style="position: absolute; text-align: right;top: 5px; right: 20px;"> <span class=pageNumber></span> of <span class=totalPages></span></div></div>'
  displayHeaderFooter: true
  margin:
    top: "80px"
    bottom: "80px"
    left: "60px"
    right: "60px"
---

為了將來 `Pupeteer` 原生支援 PDF TOC bookmarks 功能時，做個紀錄。
